meanings.english_definition: Inflammation of the tissues around the fallopian tube.

examples.sentence: Parasalpingitis can be a complication of pelvic inflammatory disease.
examples.translation: 卵管周囲炎は骨盤内炎症性疾患の合併症となりうる。

etymology.value: From para- (around) + salpingitis (inflammation of the fallopian tube).
